content: the clay headband features two mirrored cables on a reverse stockinette background the pattern is a 6-row repeat the headband is knitted flat and the shorter edges are sewn together forming a twist and hiding the seam the i-cord edges give the headband a finished look and prevent the side edges from curling finished size - width 10 5 cm 4 15″ wide - circumference 50cm 19 75″
